color.description: Button color, support for passing in 'linear-gradient' gradient
color.description_zh: 按钮颜色，支持传入 `linear-gradient` 渐变色

icon.description: The icon name or image link on the left is equivalent to the [name attribute](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon#props) of the Icon component.
icon.description_zh: 左侧图标名称或图片链接，等同于 Icon 组件的 [name 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

icon-prefix.description: Icon class name prefix, equivalent to the [class-prefix property](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon#props) of the Icon component
icon-prefix.description_zh: 图标类名前缀，等同于 Icon 组件的 [class-prefix 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

icon-position.description_zh: 图标展示位置，可选值为 right

tag.description: The HTML tag of the root node of the button
tag.description_zh: 按钮根节点的 HTML 标签

native-type.description: Type attribute of the native button tag
native-type.description_zh: 原生 button 标签的 type 属性

block.description: Whether it is a block-level element

plain.description: Whether it is a plain button

square.description: Whether it is a square button

round.description: Whether it is a round button

loading.description: Whether it is displayed as a loading state

loading-type.description: [Loading Icon Type] (https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/loading), which can be spinner
loading-type.description_zh: [加载图标类型](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/loading)，可选值为 spinner

loading-size.description: Load icon size, default unit is px
loading-size.description_zh: 加载图标大小，默认单位为 px

url.description: The link address that you will be directed to after clicking
url.description_zh: 点击后跳转的链接地址

to.description: Click to jump to the destination route object, which is equivalent to the [to property](https://router.vuejs.org/zh/api/interfaces/RouterLinkProps.html#Properties-to) of the Vue Router.
to.description_zh: 点击后跳转的目标路由对象，等同于 Vue Router 的 [to 属性](https://router.vuejs.org/zh/api/interfaces/RouterLinkProps.html#Properties-to)

replace.description: Whether to replace the current page history when redirecting
replace.description_zh: 是否在跳转时替换当前页面历史

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when the button is clicked and the button status is not loaded or disabled
events.description_zh: 点击按钮，且按钮状态不为加载或禁用时触发

events.name: touchstart
events.description: Triggered when you start touching the button
